title: 智利研究：一劑科興毫無保護力

replies.msg: https://hk.appledaily.com/international/20210408/HOI66NVQUNA4PBW5ILKQX6GR5Q/

在南美洲接種武漢肺炎疫苗進度領先各國的智利，一項研究顯示只打一劑疫苗，幾乎全無保護力，而當地至今接種的疫苗，93%是中國的科興疫苗。

智利大學的研究，一併計算接種科興疫苗和輝瑞/BioNTech疫苗不同時間後的保護率，指接種一劑疫苗後28日內，保護率只有3%，跟誤差率相同，即有可能實際是0%；而在接種第二劑疫苗後的兩星期內，保護率升至27.7%，兩星期後則升至56.5%，其中科興疫苗保護率估計為54%。

長者不接種中招風險大增

該研究又估計，75至79歲人士如沒打疫苗，武肺感染率將增80%，70至74歲人士感染率則會增加60%。

以色列早前有研究指醫護人員打一劑輝瑞疫苗後，保護率已達85%，兩劑則升至94%。

智利1,520萬人口中，已有707萬人至少接種一劑疫苗，404萬人已接種兩劑，但當地近期每日確診數字仍逾8,000，超越去年第一波。智利大學校長比瓦爾迪表示，「接種疫苗很明顯地減低受感染可能，不會完全消除，但會減低很多，所以大家應該接種」，但單是注射一劑，受感染機率跟沒接種的人差不多一樣。

Despite the high infection rates, there is much optimism.

At a retirement home in the south of Chile where residents and personnel received a first vaccine dose in the opening week of February, a subsequent outbreak of coronavirus in the facility infected 70 people. The only death was a resident who hadn't been vaccinated.

There is much hope, too, in hospitals.

Ugarte said that during the worst stages of the pandemic last year, the Coquimbo hospital was seeing between 150 and 170 of its 1,700-strong workforce infected with COVID-19.

"Now, with 80 per cent of the staff having been fully vaccinated for a few weeks, there is one!" he added, calling it "the first great demonstration" of the vaccine's impact.

replies.msg:
Similarly, neutralizing antibody responses were also significantly decreased for the Brazilian/Japanese P.1 strain (6.7-fold for BNT162b2, p < 0.0001; 4.5-fold for mRNA-1273, p < 0.001), which harbors three mutations in RBD (K417T, E484K, and N501Y) and has also been found in cases of re-infection (nuno_faria 2021).

Strikingly, neutralization of all three South African B.1.351 strains was substantially decreased for both 2-dose vaccines (v1: 34.5-fold for BNT162b2 and 27.7-fold for mRNA-1273; v2: 41.2-fold for BNT162b2 and 20.8-fold for mRNA-1273; v3: 42.4-fold for BNT162b2 and 19.2-fold for mRNA-1273; p < 0.0001 for all comparisons)
